files.description: Codebook v0.1 with category definitions, decision rules, and labeled examples for consistent annotation.
Machine-readable JSON Schema defining required fields, allowed values, and cross-field constraints for task taxonomy records.
CSV field dictionary listing columns, types, allowed values, and descriptions matching the JSON schema.
Runnable validator script that loads JSON/CSV, checks required fields and allowed category values, and enforces cross-field constraints with clear error reporting.
Example JSONL dataset containing both valid and intentionally invalid records to demonstrate codebook usage and validator behavior.

missionDescription: Create codebook v0.1 (definitions + decision rules + examples), define JSON/CSV schema fields, and implement a validator script that checks required fields, allowed category values, and cross-field constraints; save all in /outputs/task_taxonomy.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
